name: Translatron
body:
Translatron
===========
This is a project for my spanish GCSE.

##What is this

This is a site created with github pages to conjugate words.

Features
========
- [ ] Conjugating to present tense
- [ ] Conjugating to past imperfect
- [ ] Conjugating other tenses
- [ ] Translation?

How to use
==========
Enter your word and click the congugate button.

**Important: will congugate words by standard and will not notice iregular verbs (Currently)**

Conjugator
==========

HTML EDIT HERE

Other Links
===========
